purpose: Test that autonomous agent extracts only RECOMMENDATION line and appends directive correctly
response:
Fixed the autonomous agent prompt duplication issue successfully. The agent now extracts only the recommendation line instead of submitting the entire response content. This eliminates overly long prompts and ensures proper autonomous operation.
